content: want a decoration that smells good summer sea and beach the starfish pillow will be perfect for your decor with a chenille or velvet yarn it will bring in addition its side very soft and fluffy perfect to put his head on as decoration in a room or on your sofa or take it on a trip as a headrest **very easy and quick to make less than 2 hours ** this pillow is crocheted in all the colors you like **beginner difficulty** *finished size* height 33 cm width 33 cm *material used* - crochet 6 mm or crochet hook suitable for your yarn - chenille or velvet yarn the color you want - wool needle - stuffing - stitch markers - a pair of scissors *abbreviations used* r row single_crochet single_crochet increase increase decrease decrease chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch * * repeat around the row in the same stitch **all rights reserved you can not resell share modify or publish this pattern copyright 2024 myrainbowcrochet**
